details.title: Serf agent is not running in dr-bffmobile on host:dr-bffmobile-app02
details.tags: auto-managed, aws-prod, aws_env:dr, aws_type:dr-bffmobile-app, bff_mobile, base, bffmobile-app, env:dr-bffmobile, host:dr-bffmobile-app02, monitor, pd_az:us-west-1b, pd_chef_env:dr-bffmobile, pd_deployment_env_of_host:production, pd_env:production, pd_world:production, production
details.body: The serf agent is not running. It should be running on every box in our infrastructure since it is the mechanism by which we run Chef across the whole fleet. To fix this, log onto the affected box and start it: sudo service serf start. Additionally you should check the serf logs to see if there are any errors mentioned. For more information, see https://pagerduty.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SRE/pages/36438384/Serf+Operations. Severity: Error [Notify: @pagerduty-BFF_Mobile_Low] system.processes.number over env:dr-bffmobile,host:dr-bffmobile-app02,process_name:serf_agent was < 1.0 at all times during the last 10m.
